### Description

- Univariate and bivariate analysis of the public Wisconsin Breast Cancer dataset.

- Machine leaning models (Decision tree, Neural Networks) applied on the data to predict the breast cancer type ( Benign or Malignant ).

( Note : This is the first version of the application, more analysis will be added. )
